name: Kaskus Hot Thread Widget
author: Hendra Setiawan

sections.description:
Kaskus has a thousands of forum posting per day. The Kaskus team will choice 9 best forum post in a day. This plugin will show the best forum post (we called it as Hot Thread) in blog sidebar.

Basically, this plugin call the rss from Yahoo Pipes.

It safe, because it run under Yahoo server. The plugin will generate xml from this rss, and extract it into a widget. So you can load Kaskus Hot Thread automatically.

Bahasa Indonesia / Bahasa Kaskus :
Kaskus Hot Thread Widget adalah plugin yang berfungsi untuk menampilkan Hot Thread secara live di Blog agan.

Silakan didownload gan! Gratis!
Jangan ngaku kaskuser kalo belum install plugin ini di blog agan.

  • Plugin telah diupdate ke Versi 1.1 gan!
    Pasca berubahnya Kaskus menjadi Kaskus Evolution, Plugin ini sempat tidak berfungsi.
    Kabar baiknya, versi 1.1 ini sudah support untuk Kaskus Evolution.
    Selamat menggunakan gan. Salam Kaskuser.

Arbitrary section 1

  1. This plugin using Yahoo Pipes to call the RSS.
sections.installation:
1. Upload kaskus-ht-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Widget menu in WordPress and put the Kaskus Hot Thread widget into your blog Sidebar.
sections.faq:
How it works?

This plugin works with RSS system from Yahoo Pipes. Basicly, it read RSS feed of kaskus Hot Thread.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version of this plugin.

1.1

  • Works well on Kaskus Evolution

short_description: Kaskus.co.id is the largest Indonesian Community. This plugin will show Hot Thread (Best Forum Post) automatically in Blog Sidebar.
